title: I want to change my current name to the same name except make one letter lowercase.
body: What do I do? Do I have to pay? Someone please help.

replies.body: We can look into this for you!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into your issue individually if you haven't had a capitalization change in the past.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
